job_history.work_description: Reduced employee attrition by 5% in Business Unit with higher Employee connect and rolling out programs boosting the employee morale. Worked on developing the existing Employee Appraisal process to a comprehensive Performance Management process resulting in an optimized process flow. Helped the Senior Leadership team in defining a crisp Career Path - for both technical and Managerial positions. Devised a special program for the High Performers in the Organization leading to differentiated career trajectories retaining the cream layer of the Organization. Worked on optimization of the existing Reward and Recognition process. Developed internal job portal aimed at providing collaborative environment to facilitate Internal sourcing. Worked on 360 degree feedback process for the Managers.

Handled Performance Improvement Plan for the bottom performers and handling other disciplinary processes such as warnings and termination. Manager Feedback/ Skip Level - administer skip level that provides feedback to the manager which acts a development tool for improvement. People Engagement Project Level Engagement Survey - administer the survey for various strategic accounts to understand the health of the account.

Providing and processing payroll Inputs. Managing the Employee benefits such as Medical Insurance. Coordinating for Training and Development needs of the employees. Maintain compliance with federal and state regulations concerning employment. Work with corporate group in running Organization Development activities.

skills.name: Performance Management
skills.explanation: Developed and optimized the existing Employee Appraisal process to a comprehensive Performance Management process, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Engagement
skills.explanation: Worked on programs boosting employee morale, conducted Employee Engagement Surveys, and devised a special program for High Performers, showing strong proficiency in employee engagement.

skills.name: Talent Management
skills.explanation: Helped define a crisp Career Path for technical and Managerial positions, and developed a program for High Performers, indicating strong proficiency in talent management.

skills.name: Reward and Recognition
skills.explanation: Worked on optimization of the existing Reward and Recognition process, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Provided and processed payroll inputs as an HR Assistant, indicating a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Employee Benefits
skills.explanation: Managed employee benefits such as Medical Insurance, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Coordinated training and development needs of employees, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Compliance Management
skills.explanation: Maintained compliance with federal and state regulations concerning employment, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided feedback to managers through skip-level feedback, indicating some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Conducted surveys and provided feedback, indicating some practical experience in communication.
